title: An account of the blessed end of Gulielma Maria Penn, and of Springet Penn, the beloved wife and eldest son of William Penn
author: Penn, William, 1644-1718.
publisher: Printed for the benefit of his family, relations, and particular friends, in memory of them, and the Lord's goodness to them,
notes: Place and date of publication from Wing.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
